verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Out of the depths<WH4615> have I cried<WH7121> unto thee<WH3068>, O Jehovah.
Lord <WH136>, hear<WH8085> my voice<WH6963>: Let thine ears<WH241> be attentive<WH7183> To the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469>.
If thou<WH3050>, Jehovah, shouldest mark<WH8104> iniquities<WH5771>, O Lord<WH136>, who could stand<WH5975>?
But there is forgiveness<WH5547> with thee<WH3372>, That thou mayest be feared.
I wait<WH6960> for Jehovah<WH3068>, my soul<WH5315> doth wait<WH6960>, And in his word<WH1697> do I hope<WH3176>.
My soul<WH5315> waiteth for the Lord<WH136> More than watchmen<WH8104> wait for the morning<WH1242>; Yea<WH8104>, more than watchmen for the morning<WH1242>.
O Israel<WH3478>, hope<WH3176> in Jehovah<WH3068>; For with Jehovah<WH3068> there is lovingkindness<WH2617>, And with him is plenteous<WH7235> redemption<WH6304>.
And he will redeem<WH6299> Israel<WH3478> From all his iniquities<WH5771>.
